name: Polaroid #2
description: It's a picture of this house from the street. It looks empty without any trees out front. You wonder when this was taken.

verbInteractions.Look at: It's a picture of this house from the street. It looks empty without any trees out front. You wonder when this was taken.
verbInteractions.Take/Pick up: You take the Polaroid with you.
verbInteractions.Eat: That doesn't sound like a good idea.
verbInteractions.Flip: There's a number 5 on the back.
